ValidationRule.description: Freeze G5 Trigger and Comments for G5 preparation fields after G5
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name != "Data Loader Profile", OR( AND( ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Win the Case (Negotiate)'), ISPICKVAL(Phase_Status__c,'Pending Win/Loss Declaration') ), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Handover (Prepare for Delivery)'), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Execute (Start Delivery)'), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Completed') ), OR( ISCHANGED(G5_Trigger__c), ISCHANGED(Comments_for_G5_preparation__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Cannot change the G5 Trigger and Comments for G5 Preparation fields after G5 Approval
